title: 炸树机
author: 肚肚(MC ID:dualie)
description: 这是一台适合大批量收集木材的半自动炸树机。通过骨粉催熟树苗、再用 TNT 自动炸树，轻松搞定一大堆木头。此外还支持挂机操作～不过用完千万记得关掉音乐盒，不然它就不是炸树机，而是炸·炸树机了T T
steps: 确保左手拿着树苗，右手拿着骨粉。
打开左边的自动补骨粉开关和右边控制TNT的音乐盒。
站到指定位置，对准泥土块按住右键不放(可挂机使用)。
走之前别忘了关掉两个开关！

title: 刷沙机
author: 云淼(MC ID:YunMiao)
description: The Sand Machine automates the collection of sand, providing a steady supply for construction and crafting needs.

title: 黏土机
description: The Clay Machine is a highly efficient tool for gathering clay, essential for building and crafting projects.

title: 炸石机
description: The Stone Bomb Machine is perfect for mining large quantities of stone quickly and efficiently.

title: 简易熔炉组
description: The Simple Furnace Group is a compact and easy-to-use setup for smelting ores and cooking food.

title: 67速熔炉组
author: 云淼(MC ID:YunMiao)
description: The Efficient Furnace Group maximizes smelting speed and fuel efficiency, ideal for large-scale operations.

title: 陆地村民交易所
description: The Land Villager Trading Post provides a convenient location for trading with villagers on land.

title: 空岛村民交易所
description: The Sky Island Villager Trading Post is a unique setup for trading with villagers in sky-based environments.

title: 制冰机
description: The Ice Machine automates the production of ice blocks, useful for building and cooling systems.

title: 墨鱼塔
author: 云淼(MC ID:YunMiao)
description: The Squid Tower is optimized for collecting ink sacs from squids, essential for dye production.

title: 陆地食物塔
description: The Land Food Tower is a reliable source of food production for land-based setups.

title: 空岛食物塔
description: The Sky Island Food Tower provides efficient food production in sky-based environments.

title: 蛙明灯机
description: The Frog Light Machine automates the production of frog lights, a decorative and unique light source.

title: 升级版炸树机
description: The Upgraded Tree Bomb Machine improves upon the original design, offering faster and more efficient tree clearing.

title: 史莱姆/女巫刷怪塔
description: The Slime/Witch Tower combines slime and witch farming into one efficient structure, providing valuable resources for crafting and potions.

title: 猪人经验/猪灵交易塔
author: 云淼(MC ID:YunMiao)
description: The Piglin XP/Trading Tower is a highly efficient structure designed to maximize experience gain and trading opportunities with Piglins.

title: 简易混凝土固化器
author: 涂涂(MC ID:Yuushatutu)
description: 适合新手使用的简易混凝土固化器。由于设备仅支持手动操作，暂无法实现自动化，因此更适合在需要少量混凝土的时候使用～
steps: 确保左手拿着混凝土粉末，右手拿着稿子。
站到指定位置，对准水块，右键放混凝土粉末，左键挖。

title: 袭击塔
author: 云淼(MC ID:YunMiao)
description: 这是一座高效的袭击塔，专门用于刷取村民袭击事件。通过自动化的设计，可以轻松获取大量的经验和战利品。
products: 绿宝石、不死图腾、红石粉、萤石粉、火药、木棍、玻璃瓶、蜘蛛眼、糖
